- *For other implementations of the monster, see [Cerberus](/wiki/Cerberus "Cerberus").*

**Cerberus**, d, is a [unique](/wiki/Unique "Unique") [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"). He is a [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivorous "Carnivorous") and multiheaded [hell hound](/wiki/Hell_hound "Hell hound")-like [canine](/wiki/Canine "Canine") that is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong"), possesses [regeneration](/wiki/Regeneration "Regeneration") and can be seen via [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). Cerberus guards passage to the majority of [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom"), and the drawbridge on his level cannot open until he is defeated.

Cerberus has a strong bite attack, a second [poisonous](/wiki/Poisonous "Poisonous") bite, a third strong bite that inflicts [fire](/wiki/Fire "Fire") damage, and two strong claw attacks. Cerberus possesses [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance").

[Eating](/wiki/Eating "Eating") Cerberus's [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") has a chance of conveying fire resistance.

## Generation

Cerberus will always be created hostile, and is not a valid target for [polymorph](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph").

Cerberus appears on the center-most island of [The Gate of Hell](/index.php?title=The_Gate_of_Hell\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "The Gate of Hell (page does not exist)").

## Encyclopedia entry

Cerberus, (or Kerberos in Greek), was the three-headed dog  
that guarded the Gates of Hell. He allowed any dead to enter,  
and likewise prevented them all from ever leaving. He was  
bested only twice: once when Orpheus put him to sleep by  
playing bewitching music on his lyre, and the other time when  
Hercules confronted him and took him to the world of the  
living (as his twelfth and last labor).

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Cerberus_\(xNetHack\)\&action=edit)*

Cerberus (xNetHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
d Cerberus
Difficulty 20
Attacks Bite 5d6 physical, Bite 3d4 poisonous (constitution), Bite 5d6 fire, Claw 6d6 physical, Claw 6d6 physical
d Cerberus
Difficulty 20
Attacks

Bite 5d6 physical, Bite 3d4 poisonous (constitution), Bite 5d6 fire, Claw 6d6 physical, Claw 6d6 physical

Base level 15
Base experience ?
Speed 15
Base AC 2
Base MR 80
Alignment −7 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1000
Nutritional value 350
Size large
Resistances fire resistance
Resistances conveyed fire

Cerberus:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • regenerates HP quickly.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • appears only in Gehennom.

For other implementations of the monster, see Cerberus.

Cerberus, d, is a unique monster that appears in xNetHack. He is a carnivorous and multiheaded hell hound-like canine that is strong, possesses regeneration and can be seen via infravision. Cerberus guards passage to the majority of Gehennom, and the drawbridge on his level cannot open until he is defeated.

Cerberus has a strong bite attack, a second poisonous bite, a third strong bite that inflicts fire damage, and two strong claw attacks. Cerberus possesses fire resistance.

Eating Cerberus's corpse or tin has a chance of conveying fire resistance.

Generation

Cerberus will always be created hostile, and is not a valid target for polymorph.

Cerberus appears on the center-most island of The Gate of Hell.

Encyclopedia entry

Cerberus, (or Kerberos in Greek), was the three-headed dog
that guarded the Gates of Hell. He allowed any dead to enter,
and likewise prevented them all from ever leaving. He was
bested only twice: once when Orpheus put him to sleep by
playing bewitching music on his lyre, and the other time when
Hercules confronted him and took him to the world of the
living (as his twelfth and last labor).

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

'''Cerberus''', {{monsym|Cerberus}}, is a [[unique]] [[monster]] that appears in [[xNetHack]]. He is a [[carnivorous]] and multiheaded [[hell hound]]-like [[canine]] that is [[strong]], possesses [[regeneration]] and can be seen via [[infravision]]. Cerberus guards passage to the majority of [[Gehennom]], and the drawbridge on his level cannot open until he is defeated.

Cerberus has a strong bite attack, a second [[poisonous]] bite, a third strong bite that inflicts [[fire]] damage, and two strong claw attacks. Cerberus possesses [[fire resistance]].

[[Eating]] Cerberus's [[corpse]] or [[tin]] has a chance of conveying fire resistance.

==Generation==
Cerberus will always be created hostile, and is not a valid target for [[polymorph]].

Cerberus appears on the center-most island of [[The Gate of Hell]].
